articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: BCCI official's no-holds-barred 'PCB leadership' revelation in reply to Sethi - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former PCB chair Najam Sethi was critical of the Asia Cup being co-hosted by Sri Lanka, owing to poor weather conditions in Pallekele. | Cricket
articles.content: The rain threat loomed large over Asia Cup 2023 matches in Sri Lanka throughout the group stages. The highly-anticipated clash between India and Pakistan in the Asia Cup was marred by unrelenting rai… [+3605 chars]
